episodes.title: Raised in a Cult, Forced to Marry... Until I Escaped | Cult Survivor Story
episodes.description:
Imagine growing up surrounded by a world that controls every thought, every action, and every belief you have. For Sarah Thompson, this was her childhood. This chilling video takes you inside the secretive world of the cult that held her captive, and reveals how she managed to break free from its clutches.

#forcedmarriageawareness #survivalstory #abusesurvivors 

LIKE, COMMENT, & SUBSCRIBE! If you want more of this content, hit that LIKE button, drop a COMMENT sharing your own experiences, and SUBSCRIBE for more awesome videos! Don’t forget to ring the BELL so you never miss out!
THANKS FOR WATCHING!
Remember, everyone’s got a story – what’s yours?

episodes.title: I Escaped an Ultra-Orthodox Cult—Was I Ever Truly Free?
episodes.description:
Fraidy Reiss, raised in an ultra-orthodox Jewish cult, was forced into a marriage at 18 despite signs of abuse. After years of violence and control, she broke free, risking everything, including her family and community. Her journey of survival led her to create Unchained at Last, an organization that helps others escape forced and child marriages. Her story is a testament to courage, resilience, and the power of finding freedom.
